tailoring.summary: Business Program Management: Delivering measurable impact through structured execution and data-driven decision making at Microsoft. I deliver measurable impact with clear ownershi
bullets: Delivered measurable impact using core requirements while aligning outcomes to Business Program Management expectations at Microsoft. using core capability.
Delivered measurable impact using data-driven decision making and quantified business outcomes. using core capability.

tailoring.cover_letter: Dear Hiring Team, I am applying for the Business Program Management role at Microsoft in Gurgaon. My experience with delivering measurable outcomes across cross-functional initiatives aligns directly with your need for Business Program Management. I bring structured execution, clear stakeholder communication, and a consistent focus on measurable impact. Regards, [Your Name]
